10  bool RRScheduler::RRModel::isRoundExpired()
11  {
12  Task* t = dynamic_cast<Task*>(_rtTask);
13 
14  assert(t != NULL);
15 
16  Tick last = t->getLastSched();
17  if (_rrSlice > 0 && (SIMUL.getTime() - last) >= _rrSlice)
18  return true;
19  return false;
20  }

32  RRScheduler::RRScheduler(int defSlice) :
33  Scheduler(), defaultSlice(defSlice)
34  {
35  DBGENTER(_RR_SCHED_DBG_LEV);
36  DBGPRINT_2("DEFAULT SLICE = ", defaultSlice);
37  register_handler(_rrEvt, this, &RRScheduler::round);
38  }

41  void RRScheduler::setRRSlice(AbsRTTask* task, Tick slice)
42  {
43  RRModel* model = dynamic_cast<RRModel *>(find(task));
44  if (model == 0) throw RRSchedExc("Cannot find task");
45  model->setRRSlice(slice);
46  }
47 
48  void RRScheduler::notify(AbsRTTask* task)
49  {
50  DBGENTER(_RR_SCHED_DBG_LEV);
51  _rrEvt.drop();
52 
53  if (task != NULL) {
54  RRModel* model = dynamic_cast<RRModel *>(find(task));
55  if (model == 0) throw RRSchedExc("Cannot find task");
56  if (model->getRRSlice() > 0) {
57  _rrEvt.post(SIMUL.getTime() + model->getRRSlice());
58  DBGPRINT_2("rrEvt post at time ",
59  SIMUL.getTime() + model->getRRSlice());
60  }
61  }
62 
63 
64  }
65 
66  void RRScheduler::round(Event *)
67  {
68  DBGENTER(_RR_SCHED_DBG_LEV);
69  RRModel* model = dynamic_cast<RRModel *>(_queue.front());
70  if (model == 0) throw RRSchedExc("Cannot find task");
71 
72  if (model->isRoundExpired()) {
73  DBGPRINT("Round expired");
74  _queue.erase(model);
75  if (model->isActive()) {
76  model->setInsertTime(SIMUL.getTime());
77  _queue.insert(model);
78  }
79  }
80 
81 // if it is not active... ?
82  RRModel* first = dynamic_cast<RRModel *>(_queue.front());
83 // if (first == 0) throw RRSchedExc("Cannot find task");
84 
85  if (first != 0) {
86  Tick slice = first->getRRSlice();
87  if (slice == 0) _rrEvt.drop();
88  else {
89  if (first != model || first->isRoundExpired()) {
90  _rrEvt.drop();
91  _rrEvt.post(SIMUL.getTime() + slice);
92  }
93  }
94  }
95  if (_kernel) {
96  DBGPRINT("informing the kernel");
97  _kernel->dispatch();
98  }
99 
100  }
101 
102  void RRScheduler::addTask(AbsRTTask *task) throw(RRSchedExc)
103  {
104  DBGENTER(_RR_SCHED_DBG_LEV);
105 
106  RRModel *model = new RRModel(task);
107 
108  if (find(task) != NULL)
109  throw RRSchedExc("Element already present");
110 
111  _tasks[task] = model;
112 
113  model->setRRSlice(defaultSlice);
114  DBGPRINT_2("Default slice set: ", defaultSlice);
115 
116  }
117 
118  void RRScheduler::addTask(AbsRTTask* task, const std::string &p)
119  {
120  DBGENTER(_RR_SCHED_DBG_LEV);
121  AbsRTTask *mytask = dynamic_cast<AbsRTTask *>(task);
122 
123  if (mytask == 0)
124  throw RRSchedExc("Cannot add a AbsRTTask to RR");
125 
126  RRModel *model = new RRModel(mytask);
127 
128  if (find(task) != NULL)
129  throw RRSchedExc("Element already present");
130 
131  _tasks[task] = model;
132 
133  int slice = 0;
134 
135  DBGPRINT_2("Slice parameter: ", p);
136  if (p == "") slice = defaultSlice;
137  else {
138  stringstream ss(p);
139  ss >> slice;
140  }
141 
142  DBGPRINT_2("Slice set to: ", slice);
143 
144  model->setRRSlice(slice);
145 
146  }
147 
148  RRScheduler *RRScheduler::createInstance(vector<string> &par)
149  {
150  int slice;
151  stringstream ss(par[0]);
152  ss >> slice;
153  return new RRScheduler(slice);
154  }
155 }
